personas.description: Fourth-year CSC student in the blended BS+MS program, serves as a CSC 357 lab TA and loves troubleshooting systems bugs.
Third-year Software Engineering major with a focus on concurrency and backend tooling; study buddy in many lower-division labs.
Second-year CSC student juggling band rehearsals and algorithms; often organizes midterm study groups.
Fourth-year CSC and math double-major who keeps meticulous Piazza notes and curates class resource folders.
CSC 349 professor who blends theoretical proofs with practical take-home questions; actively posts clarifications on Canvas.
Fourth-year Computer Engineering student polishing portfolios before graduation; leads IEEE workshop signups.
Fifth-year CSC student finishing the blended MS, mentors ACM interview prep and keeps tabs on campus recruiting events.
ACM chapter officer coordinating industry outreach, resume reviews, and member communications.
Third-year CSC student deep into systems programming; documents every hurdle in the CPE labs.
Graduate student in the parallel computing lab; pops into Discord to share shell tips and GPU access info.
